title: The Tenants of Building 38: An Anthology
description: The Tenants of Building 38 is a unique anthology created through a collection of works from various authors.Each apartment exists of a tenant, each with a story to tell. Come with us to delve into a world that's a little bit different. . . .This anthology has thirty-eight stories, all by various authors. Each story focuses on a tenant of the apartment, and the anthology has all genres of stories, from horror to romance.
author: Sophia Olson
